channel.title: How do i add stuff like shops to my game
channel.description: im missing burrows and stuff how do i add store ppl or mini games?also how do i add fishing spots.

item.title: How do i add stuff like shops to my game
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Casey if you add me on msn Ill help. Just Pm me. Or try using search bar or google.com. I actually found both of these on search bar and google.com in under 5 minutes. Anyway, Goodluck with your server. I hope you can get it!

item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

If people took initiative and actually searched for the answer themselves they would most likely find it either on these forums, or somewhere else on the web. Chances are the question has been asked before.

item.title: How do i add stuff like shops to my game
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:4, topic:324500”]What would reading through Java.com, Have ANYTHING to do with adding shops, NPC’s, or Mini-Games.
I know it’s coded in java, but you don’t need to know Java to add that kind of stuff.[/quote]

Knowing Java will help him understand and write his own code in the future. All he will be doing is copy and pasting which doesn’t teach anything.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add stuff like shops to my game
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:3, topic:324500”]From what I can see you know nothing about java. Here is a tip, if you want to start programming rs2 or other java programs you should probably go to www.java.com and read through guides maybe order a book and study until you understand and you will have answered your question now and your future ones as well. Have fun ^_^.[/quote] You’re quite the little troll.

What would reading through Java.com, Have ANYTHING to do with adding shops, NPC’s, or Mini-Games.
I know it’s coded in java, but you don’t need to know Java to add that kind of stuff.

Here is a tip, if you want to start programming rs2 or other java programs you should probably go to www.java.com and read through guides maybe order a book and study until you understand and you will have answered your question now and your future ones as well. Have fun ^_^.
